section.name: Join the Jaulp community
section.p: The Jaulp project is built by the open source community. Anyone can get involved by develop new utility classes and modules or submitting documentation or anything else. You can report bugs and explaining with a good level of detail how to reproduce it. This is very important.

section.name: How to get involved
section.p:
You can send a request to the
project manager. Note that you have to be registered and logged in the sf.net so you can send a request.
Jaulp development discussion takes place on the
developer forum. Note that you have to be registered and logged in the sf.net so you can see the developer forum.
